help.general: Make an API call to Junebug with https://junebug.cts/api?argument=value&argument=value&parameter=value
arguments: room=(string) will return the status of all devices in a room, provided it exists.
building=(string) will return the status of all of the devices in a building, provided it exists.
uptime=(integer) will return all devices with an uptime equal to or greater than the provided number.
priority=(low|medium|high) will return all devices with a priority status equal to the value provided.
parameters: max=(integer) will limit the number of returned rooms.
offset=(integer) will shift the returned values by some number (the first room being indexed as offset=0).
